name: Sinister Nights
description:
"Sinister night" is an exciting indie horror game that throws the player into an intense struggle for survival in an abandoned workshop infected with creepy animatronics.

Features of the game:
  • Unique gameplay: The player controls a security guard locked in the workshop office. He has to use a surveillance camera system to monitor the movements of animatronics and prevent their approach.
  • Strategic decisions: The player must wisely allocate their resources, such as energy and strength for the doors to survive the night. Close the doors when the animatronics approach, and pay attention to the panel to reveal their hidden plans.
  • Horror Atmosphere: Realistic sounds and graphics create an incredibly tense atmosphere that increases fear and adrenaline.
Will you survive in this fight for your life against animatronics, or will you remain their next victim?
